import './BgRemove.css'; import close from './assets/close.png' import logo from './assets/logo.png' import banner from './assets/banner.png' import { useState } from 'react'; import DownloadImg from './DownloadImg'; function BgRemove() { const [tabname, settabname] = useState('no_bg'); function tab_click(){ settabname('original'); } return (

); } export default BgRemove;
